short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get rid of Twitter's image crop on single image tweets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter has updated its mobile app so that it displays vertical sized images properly, but the desktop version still has an awful crop. This extension simply fixes the site so that vertical sized images will display properly. This only works for single image posts, not photosets.
